verses.verse: הָעִ֣זוּ ׀ <S%H5756><s%> gather yourselves to flee בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> O ye children בִניָמִ֗ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin מִקֶּ֙רֶב֙ <S%H7130><s%> out of the midst יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וּבִתְק֙וֹעַ֙ <S%H8620><s%> in Tekoa תִּקְע֣וּ <S%H8628><s%> and blow שׁוֹפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> the trumpet וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over בֵּ֥ית הַכֶּ֖רֶם <S%H1021><s%> of fire in Bethhaccerem שְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> and set up מַשְׂאֵ֑ת <S%H4864><s%> a sign כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for רָעָ֛ה <S%H7451><s%> for evil נִשְׁקְפָ֥ה <S%H8259><s%> appeareth מִצָּפ֖וֹן <S%H6828><s%> out of the north וְשֶׁ֥בֶר <S%H7667><s%> destruction גָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> and great
הַנָּוָה֙ <S%H5000><s%> the comely וְהַמְּעֻנָּגָ֔ה <S%H6026><s%> and delicate דָּמִ֖יתִי <S%H1819><s%> compare בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> of Zion

אֵלֶ֛יהָ <S%H413><s%> about יָבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall come רֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> The shepherds וְעֶדְרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5739><s%> with their flocks תָּקְע֨וּ <S%H8628><s%> unto her they shall pitch עָלֶ֤יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and אֹהָלִים֙ <S%H168><s%> [their] tents סָבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> against her round about רָע֖וּ <S%H7462><s%> they shall feed אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in his place

קַדְּשׁ֤וּ <S%H6942><s%> Prepare עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> against מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> ye war ק֖וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> against her arise וְנַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> and let us go up בַֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <S%H6672><s%> at noon א֥וֹי <S%H188><s%> Woe לָ֙נוּ֙ כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for פָנָ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> goeth away הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto us for the day כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יִנָּט֖וּ <S%H5186><s%> are stretched out צִלְלֵי־ <S%H6752><s%> for the shadows עָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> of the evening
ק֚וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> Arise וְנַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> and let us go בַלָּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night וְנַשְׁחִ֖יתָה <S%H7843><s%> and let us destroy אַרְמְנוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H759><s%> her palaces ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> For thus hath the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts כִּרְת֣וּ <S%H3772><s%> Hew ye down עֵצָ֔ה <S%H6097><s%> trees וְשִׁפְכ֥וּ <S%H8210><s%> and cast עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem סֹלְלָ֑ה <S%H5550><s%> a mount הִ֚יא <S%H1931><s%> This הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> this [is] the city הָפְקַ֔ד <S%H6485><s%> to be visited כֻּלָּ֖הּ <S%H3605><s%> is only עֹ֥שֶׁק <S%H6233><s%> she [is] wholly oppression בְּקִרְבָּֽהּ׃ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst

כְּהָקִ֥יר <S%H6979><s%> casteth out [בְּוֵר כ] (בַּ֙יִר֙ <S%H953><s%> cistern ק) מֵימֶ֔יהָ <S%H4325><s%> her waters כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> So הֵקֵ֣רָה <S%H6979><s%> so she casteth out רָעָתָ֑הּ <S%H7451><s%> her wickedness חָמָ֣ס <S%H2555><s%> violence וָ֠שֹׁד <S%H7701><s%> and spoil יִשָּׁ֨מַע <S%H8085><s%> is heard בָּ֧הּ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> her before פָּנַ֛י <S%H6440><s%> in her before me תָּמִ֖יד <S%H8548><s%> continually חֳלִ֥י <S%H2483><s%> [is] grief וּמַכָּֽה׃ <S%H4347><s%> and wounds

הִוָּסְרִי֙ <S%H3256><s%> Be thou instructed יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> O Jerusalem פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or תֵּקַ֥ע <S%H3363><s%> depart נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> lest my soul מִמֵּ֑ךְ <S%H4480><s%> at פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or אֲשִׂימֵ֣ךְ <S%H7760><s%> from thee lest I make שְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> thee desolate אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> a land ל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not נוֹשָֽׁבָה׃ <S%H3427><s%> not inhabited פ

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהֹוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts עוֹלֵ֛ל <S%H5953><s%> They shall throughly יְעוֹלְל֥וּ <S%H5953><s%> glean כַגֶּ֖פֶן <S%H1612><s%> as a vine שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> the remnant יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הָשֵׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> turn back יָדְךָ֔ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand כְּבוֹצֵ֖ר <S%H1219><s%> as a grapegatherer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Over סַלְסִלּֽוֹת׃ <S%H5552><s%> into the baskets

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto מִ֨י <S%H4310><s%> whom אֲדַבְּרָ֤ה <S%H1696><s%> To whom shall I speak וְאָעִ֙ידָה֙ <S%H5749><s%> and give warning וְיִשְׁמָ֔עוּ <S%H8085><s%> that they may hear הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold עֲרֵלָ֣ה <S%H6189><s%> [is] uncircumcised אָזְנָ֔ם <S%H241><s%> ? behold their ear וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יוּכְל֖וּ <S%H3201><s%> and they cannot לְהַקְשִׁ֑יב <S%H7181><s%> hearken הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> behold the word יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> has become לָהֶ֛ם לְחֶרְפָּ֖ה <S%H2781><s%> is unto them a reproach לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יַחְפְּצוּ־ <S%H2654><s%> they have no delight בֽוֹ׃

וְאֵת֩ <S%H854><s%> for חֲמַ֨ת <S%H2534><s%> of the fury יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מָלֵ֙אתִי֙ <S%H4392><s%> Therefore I am full נִלְאֵ֣יתִי <S%H3811><s%> I am weary הָכִ֔יל <S%H3557><s%> with holding in שְׁפֹ֤ךְ <S%H8210><s%> I will pour it out עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on עוֹלָל֙ <S%H5768><s%> upon the children בַּח֔וּץ <S%H2351><s%> abroad וְעַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> and on ס֥וֹד <S%H5475><s%> and upon the assembly בַּחוּרִ֖ים <S%H970><s%> of young men יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> both אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> for even the husband עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> with the wife יִלָּכֵ֔דוּ <S%H3920><s%> shall be taken זָקֵ֖ן <S%H2205><s%> the aged עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> But מְלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> with [him that is] full יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> of days

וְנָסַ֤בּוּ <S%H5437><s%> shall be turned בָֽתֵּיהֶם֙ <S%H1004><s%> And their houses לַאֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> unto others שָׂד֥וֹת <S%H7704><s%> [with their] fields וְנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> and wives יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַטֶּ֧ה <S%H5186><s%> for I will stretch out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִ֛י <S%H3027><s%> my hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Against יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> upon the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> from מִקְּטַנָּם֙ <S%H6996><s%> For from the least וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even גְּדוֹלָ֔ם <S%H1419><s%> of them even unto the greatest כֻּלּ֖וֹ <S%H3605><s%> Everyone בּוֹצֵ֣עַ <S%H1214><s%> of them every one [is] given בָּ֑צַע <S%H1215><s%> to covetousness וּמִנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> and from the prophet וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even כֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> even unto the priest כֻּלּ֖וֹ <S%H3605><s%> Everyone עֹ֥שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> every one dealeth שָּֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> falsely

וַֽיְרַפְּא֞וּ <S%H7495><s%> They have healed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֤בֶר <S%H7667><s%> also the hurt עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> ] of my people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נְקַלָּ֔ה <S%H7043><s%> slightly לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saying שָׁל֣וֹם ׀ <S%H7965><s%> Peace שָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace וְאֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> is no שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> when [there is] no peace

הֹבִ֕ישׁוּ <S%H3001><s%> Were they ashamed כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because תוֹעֵבָ֖ה <S%H8441><s%> of the abomination עָשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> when they had committed גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> neither בּ֣וֹשׁ <S%H954><s%> they were not at all לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יֵב֗וֹשׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ashamed גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even הַכְלִים֙ <S%H3637><s%> they blush לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדָ֔עוּ <S%H3045><s%> could לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יִפְּל֧וּ <S%H5307><s%> therefore they shall fall בַנֹּפְלִ֛ים <S%H5307><s%> among them that fall בְּעֵת־ <S%H6256><s%> at the time פְּקַדְתִּ֥ים <S%H6485><s%> [that] I visit יִכָּשְׁל֖וּ <S%H3782><s%> them they shall be cast down אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

כֹּ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עִמְדוּ֩ <S%H5975><s%> Stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by דְּרָכִ֨ים <S%H1870><s%> ye in the ways וּרְא֜וּ <S%H7200><s%> and see וְשַׁאֲל֣וּ ׀ <S%H7592><s%> and ask לִנְתִב֣וֹת <S%H5410><s%> paths עוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> for the old אֵי־ <S%H335><s%> Where זֶ֨ה <S%H2088><s%> he דֶ֤רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way הַטּוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> where [is] the good וּלְכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> is and walk בָ֔הּ וּמִצְא֥וּ <S%H4672><s%> therein and ye shall find מַרְגּ֖וֹעַ <S%H4771><s%> rest לְנַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> for your souls וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> But they said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> We will not נֵלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> walk

וַהֲקִמֹתִ֤י <S%H6965><s%> Also I set עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> over צֹפִ֔ים <S%H6822><s%> watchmen הַקְשִׁ֖יבוּ <S%H7181><s%> over you [saying] Hearken לְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> to the sound שׁוֹפָ֑ר <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> But they said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not נַקְשִֽׁיב׃ <S%H7181><s%> We will not hearken

לָכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore שִׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> Therefore hear הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> ye nations וּדְעִ֥י <S%H3045><s%> and know עֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> O congregation אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what בָּֽם׃

שִׁמְעִ֣י <S%H8085><s%> Hear הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> O earth הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I מֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> behold I will bring רָעָ֛ה <S%H7451><s%> evil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> upon this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> [even] the fruit מַחְשְׁבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H4284><s%> of their thoughts כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto דְּבָרַי֙ <S%H1697><s%> unto my words לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not הִקְשִׁ֔יבוּ <S%H7181><s%> because they have not hearkened וְתוֹרָתִ֖י <S%H8451><s%> nor to my law וַיִּמְאֲסוּ־ <S%H3988><s%> but rejected בָֽהּ׃

לָמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> what זֶּ֨ה <S%H2088><s%> purpose לִ֤י לְבוֹנָה֙ <S%H3828><s%> there to me incense מִשְּׁבָ֣א <S%H7614><s%> from Sheba תָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> To what purpose cometh וְקָנֶ֥ה <S%H7070><s%> cane הַטּ֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> and the sweet מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from מֶרְחָ֑ק <S%H4801><s%> from a far עֹלֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5930><s%> offerings לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> are not לְרָצ֔וֹן <S%H7522><s%> [are] not acceptable וְזִבְחֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H2077><s%> nor your sacrifices לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not עָ֥רְבוּ <S%H6149><s%> sweet לִֽי׃ ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold נֹתֵ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> Behold I will lay אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> before הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> before this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this מִכְשֹׁלִ֑ים <S%H4383><s%> stumblingblocks וְכָ֣שְׁלוּ <S%H3782><s%> shall fall בָ֠ם אָב֨וֹת <S%H1><s%> and the fathers וּבָנִ֥ים <S%H1121><s%> and the sons יַחְדָּ֛ו <S%H3162><s%> together שָׁכֵ֥ן <S%H7934><s%> upon them the neighbour וְרֵע֖וֹ <S%H7453><s%> and his friend [יֹאבֵדוּ כ] (וְאָבָֽדוּ׃ <S%H6><s%> break ק) פ

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> Behold a people בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> cometh מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country צָפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> from the north וְג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and a great יֵע֖וֹר <S%H5782><s%> shall be raised מִיַּרְכְּתֵי־ <S%H3411><s%> from the sides אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

קֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> on bow וְכִיד֞וֹן <S%H3591><s%> and spear יַחֲזִ֗יקוּ <S%H2388><s%> They shall lay hold אַכְזָרִ֥י <S%H394><s%> they [are] cruel הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יְרַחֵ֔מוּ <S%H7355><s%> and have no mercy קוֹלָם֙ <S%H6963><s%> their voice כַּיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> like the sea יֶהֱמֶ֔ה <S%H1993><s%> roareth וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Against סוּסִ֖ים <S%H5483><s%> upon horses יִרְכָּ֑בוּ <S%H7392><s%> and they ride עָר֗וּךְ <S%H6186><s%> set in array כְּאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> as men לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> for war עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> Against בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> against thee O daughter צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> of Zion

שָׁמַ֥עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> We have heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁמְע֖וֹ <S%H8089><s%> the fame רָפ֣וּ <S%H7503><s%> wax feeble יָדֵ֑ינוּ <S%H3027><s%> thereof our hands צָרָה֙ <S%H6869><s%> anguish הֶחֱזִיקַ֔תְנוּ <S%H2388><s%> hath taken hold חִ֖יל <S%H2427><s%> of us [and] pain כַּיּוֹלֵדָֽה׃ <S%H3205><s%> as of a woman in travail

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay [תֵּצְאִי כ] (תֵּֽצְאוּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> after ק) הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> into the field וּבַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay [תֵּלֵכִי כ] (תֵּלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> along ק) כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> has a חֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> for the sword לְאֹיֵ֔ב <S%H341><s%> of the enemy מָג֖וֹר <S%H4032><s%> [and] fear מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> [is] on every side

בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> O daughter עַמִּ֤י <S%H5971><s%> of my people חִגְרִי־ <S%H2296><s%> gird שָׂק֙ <S%H8242><s%> [thee] with sackcloth וְהִתְפַּלְּשִׁ֣י <S%H6428><s%> and wallow בָאֵ֔פֶר <S%H665><s%> thyself in ashes אֵ֤בֶל <S%H60><s%> thee mourning יָחִיד֙ <S%H3173><s%> [as for] an only son עֲשִׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> make לָ֔ךְ מִסְפַּ֖ד <S%H4553><s%> lamentation תַּמְרוּרִ֑ים <S%H8563><s%> most bitter כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For פִתְאֹ֔ם <S%H6597><s%> shall suddenly יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> come הַשֹּׁדֵ֖ד <S%H7703><s%> for the spoiler עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

בָּח֛וֹן <S%H969><s%> thee [for] a tower נְתַתִּ֥יךָ <S%H5414><s%> I have set בְעַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> among my people מִבְצָ֑ר <S%H4013><s%> [and] a fortress וְתֵדַ֕ע <S%H3045><s%> that thou mayest know וּבָחַנְתָּ֖ <S%H974><s%> and try אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּרְכָּֽם׃ <S%H1870><s%> their way

כֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> All סָרֵ֣י <S%H5493><s%> They [are] all grievous סֽוֹרְרִ֔ים <S%H5637><s%> revolters הֹלְכֵ֥י <S%H1980><s%> walking רָכִ֖יל <S%H7400><s%> with slanders נְחֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> [they are] brass וּבַרְזֶ֑ל <S%H1270><s%> and iron כֻּלָּ֥ם <S%H3605><s%> all מַשְׁחִיתִ֖ים <S%H7843><s%> they [are] all corrupters הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

נָחַ֣ר <S%H2787><s%> are burned מַפֻּ֔חַ <S%H4647><s%> The bellows [מֵאִשְׁתַּם כ] (מֵאֵ֖שׁ ק) (תַּ֣ם <S%H800><s%> fire ק) עֹפָ֑רֶת <S%H5777><s%> the lead לַשָּׁוְא֙ <S%H7723><s%> in vain צָרַ֣ף <S%H6884><s%> the founder צָר֔וֹף <S%H6884><s%> melteth וְרָעִ֖ים <S%H7451><s%> for the wicked לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> are not נִתָּֽקוּ׃ <S%H5423><s%> are not plucked away

כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver נִמְאָ֔ס <S%H3988><s%> Reprobate קָרְא֖וּ <S%H7121><s%> shall [men] call לָהֶ֑ם כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because מָאַ֥ס <S%H3988><s%> hath rejected יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> them because the LORD בָּהֶֽם׃ פ
